activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3800
activity.text:
Hi @viraj89 ,
This project idea really resonates with me, and I'm excited about the potential impact it can create by making Beckn UIs more accessible through AI and no-code tools. I'd love to contribute, especially in areas like frontend development, state machine workflows, and AI-driven UI generation.

Could you please share if thereâ€™s a Discord or Slack channel ?

Looking forward to connecting and contributing! 

Best,
Vaishnavi
